name: converter
title: Converter
description: Arbitrary input, direct output. Includes Base converter, Case converter, Code converter, Color converter, etc.
author: koinzhang

commands.name: base-converter
commands.title: Base Converter
commands.description: Convert number from any base to any base: decimal, binary, octal, hexadecimal, etc.

preferences.name: advanceView
preferences.label: Advance View
preferences.description: In the advanced view, you can freely choose the bases of mutual conversion.

preferences.name: advanceViewLocation
preferences.title: Advance View Location
preferences.description: Select the location of the advanced view: top or bottom.

commands.name: code-converter
commands.title: Code Converter
commands.description: Convert between different character encodings: Unicode, Base64, UTF-8, ASCII, &#xXXXX, URL.

commands.name: case-converter
commands.title: Case Converter
commands.description: Convert between different cases: camel, pascal, snake, kebab, upper, lower, title.

commands.name: color-converter
commands.title: Color Converter
commands.description: Convert between different colors space: RGB, HEX, HSL, Opacity.

preferences.name: autoDetect
preferences.label: Auto Detect
preferences.description: Automatically detects selected text or clipboard when opening commands.

preferences.name: priorityDetection
preferences.title: Priority detection
preferences.description: Priority detection of selected text or clipboard.
